MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML1 postcode area of Motherwell, affecting properties in Kings Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.02pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficulties on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.57pm on Monday 22nd February 2021.
